message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hey Alice, $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $85. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $85 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $105.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $105 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable spending. I'm happy to go up to $90, but that's my final offer.
I understand that $90 is your final offer, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell the product at that price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and sell it to you for $98.
